title: A Layer 2 Standards Working Group
description: The L2 ecosystem needs standards!  We formed a L2 standards working group as an EEA Community Project, managed by OASIS.  We will provide a quick overview of L2 standards discussion topics thus far.  Others in the L2 ecosystem are invited to join and participate in existing discussions or raise new topics. https://github.com/eea-oasis/L2
